    • Method Detail

      • createDriver

        public org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver createDriver(String browser,
                                         String capabilities)
                                           throws MalformedURLException,
                                                  ReflectiveOperationException
        Creates WebDriver instance with desired browser and capabilities. Capabilities should follow a key/value format
        Parameters:
        browser - to be initialized. Can be a remote driver URL
        capabilities - string. Should follow a key/value format
        Returns:
        webDriver instance
        Throws:
        MalformedURLException - if the remote driver has a malformed URL
        ReflectiveOperationException - if remote driver class cannot be instantiated
        See Also:
        parseCapabilities(String)

      • parseCapabilities

        protected org.openqa.selenium.Capabilities parseCapabilities(String capabilities)
        Creates Capabilities from string. Supported formats:

        key1='value1' key2='value with space 2' key3='value3'

        key1="value1" key2="value with space 2" key3="value3"

        Parameters:
        capabilities - String
        Returns:
        capabilitiesInstance which is an instanceof Capabilities
        See Also:
        FitnesseMarkup.clean(Object)
